column1: it helps that lil bow wow . . . tones down his pint sized gangsta act to play someone who resembles a real kid .

a real movie about real people that gives us a rare glimpse into a culture most of us dont know
tender yet lacerating and darkly funny fable

an engaging overview of johnsons eccentric career
